events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on March 30th, involving significant damage to the front bumper and hood.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report submitted by the customer.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle the customer's case for the vehicle collision.
Customer was contacted to confirm receipt and acknowledgement of their auto accident claim for further processing.
Requested additional documents including police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Customer promptly submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and official police records.
Auto accident claim investigation has been initiated to verify circumstances outlined in submitted documents.
Investigation concluded confirming the details and extent of the collision as described by the customer.
A settlement offer for vehicle repair costs has been proposed based on the market valuations and damage severity.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and thanked the team for their timely assistance.
The claim was formally approved after customer acceptance of the settlement terms and conditions.
Settlement payment has been processed and issued to the customer for the approved auto accident claim.
The auto accident claim has been closed following confirmation that the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
The claim file has been archived in the system as part of routine record-keeping and compliance procedures.
